if.test: searchStartDate != null and searchStartDate != '' and searchEndDate != null and searchEndDate != ''

sql.if: AND BRD_NTS_REG_DT BETWEEN REPLACE(#{searchStartDate},'-', '')||'000000' AND REPLACE(#{searchEndDate},'-', '')||'235959'

mapper.select: /* NoticeBoard.selectNoticeBoardListCount */ SELECT COUNT(BRD_NTS_IDX) FROM T_BRD_NTS WHERE BRD_NTS_TOP_YN = #{BRD_NTS_TOP_YN}

/* NoticeBoard.selectNoticeBoardInfo */ SELECT BRD_NTS_IDX, BRD_NTS_TITLE, BRD_NTS_CONTENTS, BRD_NTS_TOP_YN, BRD_NTS_READ_CNT, BRD_NTS_USE_YN, BRD_NTS_REG_DT, BRD_NTS_REG_IP, BRD_NTS_REG_ID, BRD_NTS_UPD_DT, BRD_NTS_UPD_IP, BRD_NTS_UPD_ID, BRD_CMN_COM_IDX, ( SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = BRD_NTS_REG_ID ) AS ADM_MST_NM FROM T_BRD_NTS WHERE BRD_NTS_IDX = #{BRD_NTS_IDX}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_BRD_NTS_IDX.NEXTVAL AS BRD_NTS_IDX FROM DUAL
/* NoticeBoard.insertNoticeBoard */ INSERT INTO T_BRD_NTS ( BRD_NTS_IDX, BRD_NTS_TITLE, BRD_NTS_CONTENTS, BRD_NTS_TOP_YN, BRD_NTS_READ_CNT, BRD_NTS_USE_YN, BRD_NTS_REG_DT, BRD_NTS_REG_IP, BRD_NTS_REG_ID, BRD_CMN_COM_IDX ) VALUES ( #{BRD_NTS_IDX}, #{BRD_NTS_TITLE}, #{BRD_NTS_CONTENTS:CLOB}, NVL(#{BRD_NTS_TOP_YN}, 'N'), 0, NVL(#{BRD_NTS_USE_YN}, 'N'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{BRD_NTS_REG_IP}, #{BRD_NTS_REG_ID}, #{BRD_CMN_COM_IDX} )
mapper.update: /* NoticeBoard.updateNoticeBoard */ UPDATE T_BRD_NTS SET BRD_NTS_TITLE = #{BRD_NTS_TITLE}, BRD_NTS_CONTENTS = #{BRD_NTS_CONTENTS}, BRD_NTS_TOP_YN = NVL(#{BRD_NTS_TOP_YN}, 'N'), BRD_NTS_USE_YN = NVL(#{BRD_NTS_USE_YN}, 'N'), BRD_NTS_UPD_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), BRD_NTS_UPD_IP = #{BRD_NTS_UPD_IP}, BRD_NTS_UPD_ID = #{BRD_NTS_UPD_ID}, BRD_CMN_COM_IDX = #{BRD_CMN_COM_IDX} WHERE BRD_NTS_IDX = #{BRD_NTS_IDX}
mapper.select: /* NoticeBoard.selectNoticeBoardTopCount */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_BRD_NTS WHERE 1=1 AND BRD_NTS_TOP_YN = 'Y' AND BRD_NTS_USE_YN = 'Y'
